sentences.sContent: It is impossible to hypnotise someone simply by saying a particular word or phrase.
sentences.sCn: 不可能仅通过说某个词或短语就能把人催眠。

sentences.sContent: Who first used the phrase ‘survival of the fittest’?
sentences.sCn: “适者生存”这一说法最早是谁说的？

sentences.sContent: Shakespeare’s plays are full of well-known phrases .
sentences.sCn: 莎士比亚的戏剧中写满了众所周知的名言警句。

sentences.sContent: ...The phrase almost completes itself: midlife crisis...

words.tran: 短语的；习惯用语的，成语的
用短语描述；把…分成短句（phrase的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a group of words without a finite verb, especially when they are used to form part of a sentence, such as ‘walking along the road’ and ‘a bar of soap’
